description.value:
You bid for night to fall upon the land and cause a globe of night to manifest. All non-magical light within the spell’s area is suppressed, as are magical lights from spells of a lower rank. Each creature that enters or begins its turn in the darkness must make a Will save. Creatures that fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} from this spell fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, but do not drop what they’re holding.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a –1 status penalty to Perception checks for 1 round.

Failure The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. If it's still unconscious after 1 minute, it wakes up automatically.

Critical Failure The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. If it's still unconscious after 1 hour, it wakes up automatically.

Heightened (4th) The creatures fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} for 1 round on a failure or 1 minute on a critical failure. They fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and release what they're holding, and they can't attempt Perception checks to wake up. When the duration ends, the creature is sleeping normally instead of automatically waking up.
